mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (user_id, product_id, amount, currency, status, payment_url, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{amount}, #{currency}, #{status}, #{paymentUrl}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET user_id = #{userId}, product_id = #{productId}, amount = #{amount}, currency = #{currency}, status = #{status}, payment_url = #{paymentUrl}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
